title: Applicability of part
context: PART II. ORGANIZATION OF BANKS, SAVINGS BANKS, SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATIONS, TRUST COMPANIES AND DEPOSITORY FINANCIAL SERVICES LOAN COMPANIES ยง412:3-200 Applicability of part. The provisions of this part shall govern the organization of Hawaii financial institutions that are banks, savings banks, savings and loan associations, trust companies, and depository financial services loan companies. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
